svg.text:
objectes: 1---> after assigning ip to devices ----> config basic EIGRP configure 2---> assign network to EIGRP 3---> select passive inteface 4---> set Router-id fo all routers 5---> activating authentication on EIGRP use key-chain and set life time for key-chain 6---> configure hello-interval and hold-time 7---> configure EIGRP to use Maximum 40% of the link 8---> reduce active-timer-eigrp
9--> configure unequl loadbalancing 10--> configure equal loadbalancing 11--> default-route propagation in R3 12--> summerazation network in R12 13--> inactive auto-summery in all routers 14--> EIGRP stup in in R6 , R7 15--> EIGRP filltering ----> pc-1-------> can see serrver-1--> ip-prefix-list pc-2-------> can see server -2---> Route-map 16--> static neighborship R9-----R12 R12---R13 R13---R5
